oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Excerpt from the Hillbilly Roundup radio program - KRLD - 1949-05-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of an excerpt from the Hillbilly Roundup radio program, broadcast on May 25, 1949, hosted by Johnny Hicks on KRLD (Dallas, Tex.). [Part two can be found at TR004134_1]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Boyd; Cowboy Ramblers; Ernest Tubb; Andrews Sisters; Johnny Hicks; Gene Autry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unconfirmed announcer] talks [incomplete] / (0:09) Hillbilly Roundup opening theme / (0:33) Johnny Hicks announces the opening statements / (1:33) Billy Boyd And His Cowboy Ramblers perform "Lone Star Rag" / (4:06) Johnny Hicks introduces the next performance / (4:35) Ernest Tubb and the Andrews Sisters perform "Don't Rob Another Man's Castle" written by Jenny Lou Carson / (7:17) Johnny Hicks announces a Masons Baby Chicks [phonetic] advertisement / (9:43) Gene Autry performs "Sunflower" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KRLD (Radio station : Dallas, Tex.); Hicks, Johnny, 1918-1997; Boyd, Bill, 1910-1977; Cowboy Ramblers (Musical group); Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Andrews Sisters; Carson, Jenny Lou; Autry, Gene, 1907-1998
